description: This location is a prime place for growing food.
Abundant fish populate the local waters here.
Rare plants for gathering grow in abundance here. This place is teeming with food berries and plants. Alternatively this could be a place of rare herbs, spices, and alchemical ingredients.
This location is teeming with available game. It could be a forrest full of deer, a plains of buffalo, etc.
These lands are great for grazing animals.
This land has exceptionally good quality or abundance of minerals for mining.
This place is a fountain of magical energy. It is a focus of sorcery and whatever the resource is can easily be extracted here.
This place has tons of ideal lumber for either boats, fortifications, or other industry. It could either be an abundance of a variety or a particuarly rich amount of a specific kind.
